column1: The location is for a rain gauge shown on the old OS maps close to the summit of Hurst Hill and at the correct elevation
There are notes saying the gauge is over exposed and that the readings are 5 inches too low in some cases
The Sep 1921, Mar, Apr and Sep 1927 and Jan 1941 readings are noted as being estimated therefore those readings and the associated annual totals have been removed from this record
The Aug to Dec 1940 and Feb to Apr 1941 are noted as being computed by Liverpool Water Works because gauge was faulty; these readings have been removed
